00028 #include "SloughingCellKiller.hpp"
00029 #include "AbstractCellCentreBasedTissue.hpp"
00030 
00031 SloughingCellKiller::SloughingCellKiller(AbstractTissue<2>* pCrypt, bool sloughSides)
00032     : AbstractCellKiller<2>(pCrypt),
00033       mSloughSides(sloughSides)
00034 {
00035 }
00036 
00037 
00038 bool SloughingCellKiller::GetSloughSides() const
00039 {
00040     return mSloughSides;
00041 }
00042 
00043 
00044 void SloughingCellKiller::TestAndLabelCellsForApoptosisOrDeath()
00045 {
00046     double crypt_length = CancerParameters::Instance()->GetCryptLength();
00047     double crypt_width = CancerParameters::Instance()->GetCryptWidth();
00048 
00049     for (AbstractTissue<2>::Iterator cell_iter = this->mpTissue->Begin();
00050          cell_iter != this->mpTissue->End();
00051          ++cell_iter)
00052     {
00053         double x = this->mpTissue->GetLocationOfCellCentre(&(*cell_iter))[0];
00054         double y = this->mpTissue->GetLocationOfCellCentre(&(*cell_iter))[1];
00055 
00056         if ( (y>crypt_length) ||  (mSloughSides && ((x<0.0) || (x>crypt_width))) )
00057         {
00058             cell_iter->Kill();
00059         }
00060     }
00061 }
